game.name: Draw, Draw, Pass!
game.shortDescription: Create a room or join a party, this game gets more chaotic with more people! Collaborate together on one canvas as artists and the guesser has to figure out the drawing. Will your friends make a masterpiece or a mess?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create a room or join a party, this game gets more chaotic with more people! Collaborate together on one canvas as artists and the guesser has to figure out the drawing. Will your friends make a masterpiece or a mess?
